question: Please analyze this URL https://realestate.union-investment.com/en_GB
thought: I need to first access the URL to obtain a status code and then extract the text and hyperlinks to analyze the content. The website is accessible and returns a status code of 200, indicating that it is live and functioning properly. Now I need to extract the text and hyperlinks to further analyze the content. The text extracted from the website does not contain any unusually low prices, claims of free, or promises of getting an amount of money that is generally not possible. Now I need to extract the hyperlinks to see if there are any non-existent companies or unusual payment methods. I now know the final answer - result: False

answer.reason: The website does not exhibit any of the characteristics of a scam website. The status code is 200 the text does not contain any suspicious claims and there are no hyperlinks to non-existent companies or unusual payment methods. Therefore the website is not a scam.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
